title: Is Cyberpunk 2077 Longer Than We Think? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.24.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about Cyberpunk's length, Red Dead Online going standalone, more Phil Spencer interviews, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:35 - Housekeeping
No KFGD on Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:40 - Cyberpunk 2077 might be longer than we think - Dom Peppiatt @ VG247
00:27:50 - Red Dead Online is going standalone - Rockstar Blog
00:35:15 - Microsoft hints at turning Xbox into an app for your TV - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:42:30 - Speaking of Xbox: Something seems up with Xbox Quick Resume - Ari Notis @ Kotaku
00:46:19 - Fortnite is getting a monthly $12 subscription for exclusive in-game items - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
00:52:30 - Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity on Switch breaks sales records - Stephany Nunneley @ VG247
00:56:10 -  Ad  
00:57:50 - One for me: A new Hitman map has been revealed - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
01:01:30 - Out today
01:06:45 - Squad Up:Matt Dowse(Pokemon Go) - 2640 2609 9323 (@mattdowse on twitter)
01:07:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Blessing and Imran
WED: Greg and Whitta
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
